data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kitgum, Uganda and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kitgum, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Kitgum, Uganda know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in Kitgum, Uganda.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Pour your Spirit out on the 44,700 citizens of Kitgum, Uganda, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kitgum to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Swahili people. Make the Swahili people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Kitgum, Uganda that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Kitgum unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, encourage the church of Kitgum, Uganda that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Kitgum
location.people_groups_list: Plains Bira, Amba, Nyang'i, Arab, Lebanese, Meneng
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Plains Bira (2,000), Amba (54,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Meneng (7,800)
